templates.name: Basic Docker Linux Metrics
templates.description:
Get Docker engine metrics from plugin for the New Zabbix Agent (zabbix-agent2).

You can discuss this template or leave feedback on our forum https://www.zabbix.com/forum/zabbix-suggestions-and-feedback/435429-discussion-thread-for-official-zabbix-template-docker

Generated by official Zabbix template tool "Templator"

items.name: Containers paused
items.description: Total number of containers paused on this host.

items.name: Containers running
items.description: Total number of containers running on this host.

items.name: Containers stopped
items.description: Total number of containers stopped on this host.

items.name: Containers total
items.description: Total number of containers on this host.

triggers.name: Failed to fetch info data
triggers.event_name: Failed to fetch info data (or no data for 30m)
triggers.description: Zabbix has not received data for items for the last 30 minutes.

triggers.expression: last(/Basic Docker Linux Metrics/docker.server_version,#1)<>last(/Basic Docker Linux Metrics/docker.server_version,#2) and length(last(/Basic Docker Linux Metrics/docker.server_version))>0
triggers.name: Version has changed
triggers.description: Docker version has changed. Acknowledge to close the problem manually.

discovery_rules.name: Containers discovery
discovery_rules.description:
Discovery of containers metrics.

Parameter:
true  - Returns all containers
false - Returns only running containers

trigger_prototypes.expression: last(/Basic Docker Linux Metrics/docker.container_info.state.error["{#NAME}"],#1)<>last(/Basic Docker Linux Metrics/docker.container_info.state.error["{#NAME}"],#2) and length(last(/Basic Docker Linux Metrics/docker.container_info.state.error["{#NAME}"]))>0
trigger_prototypes.name: Container {#NAME}: An error has occurred in the container
trigger_prototypes.description: Container {#NAME} has an error. Acknowledge to close the problem manually.

trigger_prototypes.name: Container {#NAME}: Health state container is unhealthy

item_prototypes.name: Container {#NAME}: Get info
item_prototypes.description: Return low-level information about a container.

item_prototypes.name: Container {#NAME}: CPU kernelmode usage per second
Container {#NAME}: CPU total usage per second
Container {#NAME}: CPU usermode usage per second
Container {#NAME}: Get stats
item_prototypes.description: Get container stats based on resource usage.
